card.name: 'Mech Hangar
card.property: {T}: You may make an additional deployment this turn. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase.

card.name: Accelerated Turnaround
card.property: Scrap Accelerated Turnaround when it is revealed. Activate only at the end of your Missions phase. Untap one 'Mech for each construction counter above the cost of Accelerated Turnaround.

card.name: Accelerate Conflict
card.property:
Put three operation counters on Accelerate Conflict when it is activated.
Remove an operation counter from this card at the beginning of your turn. When the last operation counter has been removed, scrap Accelerate Conflict and double all damage dealt to each player's Stockpile until the end of the game.
During your Repair/Reload phase, pay (3+3L). If you cannot pay this cost, scrap Accelerate Conflict.

card.name: Adam Steiner
card.property: {T}: Untap any 'Mech. Use this ability only during your Missions phase, but not during a mission. â€¢ Major 1st Somerset Strikers

card.name: Annihilator (ANH-2A)
Assassination
card.property: Scrap Assassination when it is revealed. Scrap a pilot card or unique card in play.

card.name: Assassin (ASN-23)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>This <i>Assassin</i> offers improved weapons accuracy at no cost to speed.</i>

card.name: Bait and Switch
card.property:
Play only during battle.
Roll a die.
1-2: Draw a card after the mission.
3-6: Choose one of your engaged 'Mechs that has not dealt damage. That 'Mech neither deals nor receives damage. Tap one of your untapped 'Mechs that is not engaged in the battle; that 'Mech joins the battle.
<i>Just like in poker, the best ace to have is the one up your sleeve.</i>

card.name: Berserker Warrior
card.property: Pilot: +1 initiative For each 'Mech after the first that is blocking or blocked by 'Mech piloted by Berserker Warrior, this 'Mech gets +2 attack and prevents 1 damage. Use this ability only if 'Mech piloted by Berserker Warrior attacks or blocks alone during battle. <i>Like a bear beset by wolves, the<i> Hatchetman </i>lunged forward to wreak havoc among the pack of armored figures.</i>

card.name: Blackjack (BJ-1)
Black Hawk C (Nova)
card.property:
If <i>Black Hawk C</i> attacks and is blocked, it may deal 1 of its damage to its target.
<i>Lacking other significant weaponry, this 'Mech relies heavily on the Gauss rifle for firepower.</i>

card.name: Black Market Connections
card.property: {T}: {R} {T}: Scrap two cards from your hand to put one card from your Scrapheap into your hand. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase.

card.name: Blitzkrieg
card.property: Play only when attacking. Untap each blocking 'Mech that is not guarding. Those 'Mechs neither deal nor receive damage. If no blocking 'Mechs remain, deal damage to the target as if unblocked.

card.name: Blockade
card.property:
Put three operation counters on Blockade when it is activated.
Remove an operation counter from this card at the beginning of your turn. When the last operation counter has been removed, scrap Blockade; opponent scraps three cards at the beginning of his or her turn until you deploy a card.

card.name: Blood of Kerensky
Blow the Pass!
card.property:
Play only during battle.
For each 'Mech, roll a die. Each 'Mech with the lowest die roll receives 5 damage.

card.name: Bombardier (BMB-12D)
Bribed Pilot
card.property: Scrap Bribed Pilot when it is revealed. Untap an unpiloted 'Mech your opponent controls and gain control of it until the end of your turn.

card.name: Catapult (CPLT-C1)
card.property: Missile 2 Overheat 1: +1 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>Faulty jump jets frequently cause this 'Mech to overheat.</i>

card.name: Champion (CHP-1N)
card.property:
Alpha Strike: +2 attack
<i>Many analysts have criticized the <i>Champion</i>'s weak arsenal.</i>

card.name: Chandrasekhar Kurita
card.property: {T}: Remove an operation counter from an Operation card. Use this ability only during your Missions phase, but not during a mission. {T}: Restock a card. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase. Logistics (If you have Logistics in play, you may restock a card from your hand at end of your turn.)

card.name: Charger (CGR-3K)
Commando (COM-5S)
card.property: <i>The Upgraded COM-5S uses ammunition more efficiently and with greater accuracy.</i>

card.name: Contract with Kell Hounds
card.property: {T}: One of your 'Mechs gets +3 attack and +4 armor. Use this ability only during a mission. If that 'Mech receives 5 or more damage, scrap Contract with Kell Hounds. During your Repair/Reload phase, pay (1+2P) or tap this card and choose an opponent; your opponent gains control of this card at the end of your turn.

card.name: Cover of Night
card.property:
Play only when blocked.
For each blocking 'Mech, roll a die.
1-4: No effect.
5-6: That 'Mech deals no damage.

card.name: Crab (CRB-27)
card.property: Overheat 2: +2 attack <i>The <i>Crab</i>'s all-laser configuration suits it to long missions.</i>

card.name: Cyclops (CP 10-Z)
card.property: Overheat 4: +3 attack <i>The Tacticom B-2000 battle computer gives the <i>Cyclops</i> planet-wide communications.</i>

card.name: Daishi B (Dire Wolf)
card.property: Overheat 6: +4 attack

card.name: Daishi Prime (Dire Wolf)
Dasher A (Firemoth)
card.property: Anti-Missile (Each missile assigned to a 'Mech in a group that includes <i>Dasher</i> A deals -1 damage.) If <i>Dasher A</i> is fully constructed when you activate it, you may immediately place it in your Patrol region.

card.name: Dasher B (Firemoth)
card.property: ECM (Each 'Mech in a group that includes at least one 'Mech with ECM gets +1 armor.) AP (<i>Dasher</i> B deals +1 damage to any target other than a 'Mech.) If Dasher B is fully constructed when you activate it, you may immediately place it in your Patrol region.

card.name: Defensive Formation
card.property: Prevent 1 damage to each of your 'Mechs.

card.name: Deploy Reinforcements
card.property:
Play only during battle.
Choose one of your untapped 'Mechs that is not in the battle. Roll a die.
1-2: Return Deploy Reinforcements to your hand after the mission.
3-6: Tap that 'Mech to have it join the battle.

card.name: Double-Time Offense
Earthwerks Limited
card.property:
{T}: {R} {T}: Reveal one of your 'Mechs under construction; if that 'Mech is within 2 Resources of being fully constructed, activate it. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase.
Assembly (During your Repair/Reload phase, you may pay {R} once to repair 1 point of damage to one 'Mech if you have Assembly in play.)

card.name: End Run
card.property:
Play when the number of 'Mechs your are attacking with is greater than the number of 'Mechs blocking, and only if you have Tactics in play. One of your 'Mechs may deal damage to the target as if unblocked. The target may deal damage to that 'Mech.
<i>Excuse me, Commander, but what exactly do you mean by "draw their fire"?</i>

card.name: Fanatical Leader
card.property: Pilot: +1 initiative Each other 'Mech in a group that includes a 'Mech piloted by Fanatical Leader gets +1 attack.

card.name: Fenris B (Ice Ferret)
card.property: <i>Clan Wolf unleashes this configuration to dominate close-quarters fighting.</i>

card.name: Field Command Post
Field Construction Site
card.property: {T}: {R} Scrap Field Construction Site to gain {R}{R}.

card.name: Firefly (FFL-4B)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) <i>Wolf's Dragoons is one of the few forces still fielding the <i>Firefly</i>.</i>

card.name: For the Chancellor!
card.property:
Play only when blocked.
For each blocking 'Mech that takes structure damage during this combat, untap one attacking 'Mech at the end of the combat.

card.name: Gladiator D (Executioner)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative)

card.name: Grasshopper (GHR-5J)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative)

card.name: Guillotine (GLT-3M)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative)

card.name: Haakon Magnussen
card.property: {T}: Scrap one of your Resource cards in play and draw two cards. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase. â€¢ Elected Prince of the Free Rasalhague Republic

card.name: Hazardous Battle Zone
card.property:
Play only during battle.
Each player may choose whether each of his or her 'Mechs deals damage. Each 'Mech that deals damage receives 2 damage; each 'Mech that has already dealt damage during this battle receives 2 damage.

card.name: Hermes (HER-1S)
card.property: If <i>Hermes</i> is fully constructed when you activate it, you may immediately place it in your Patrol region. <i>The aptly named <i>Hermes</i> is one of the fastest 'Mechs ever built.</i>

card.name: Hermes (HER-3S)
card.property:
If Hermes is fully constructed when you activate it, you may immediately place it in your Patrol region.
<i>The newest model of the <i>Hermes</i> is a dedicated scout.</i>

card.name: Hip Shattered
card.property: Choose a 'Mech. If that 'Mech receives structure damage, put a hindrance counter on it. A 'Mech with a hindrance counter cannot block, and its speed is slow.

card.name: Hunchback (HBK-5M)
card.property: Alpha Strike: +1 attack <i>Adding a small pulse laser cost this 'Mech a ton of its already meager supply of ammunition.</i>

card.name: Jenner (JR7-K)
card.property: Overheat 1: +1 attack

card.name: King Crab (KGC-000)
card.property:
Alpha Strike: +4 attack
<i>Two Deathgiver AC/20s give this 'Mech unrivaled short-range firepower.</i>

card.name: Kintaro (KTO-19)
card.property: Overheat 2: +1 attack NARC (You may subtract 1 from each of your missile rolls if the missiles are assigned by a 'Mech in a group that includes at least one NARC 'Mech)

card.name: Kintaro (KTO-20)
card.property: Overheat 1: +1 attack

card.name: Lance Diversion
card.property:
+1 initiative
Play only when attacking with exactly four 'Mechs. For each 'Mech fewer than four in the blocking group, you may choose to have one of your 'Mechs deal damage to the target as if unblocked. The target may deal damage to that 'Mech.

card.name: Lance Formation
card.property:
+1 initiative
Play only when attacking or blocking with exactly four 'Mechs.
Each of your engaged 'Mechs gets +1 attack.

card.name: Lostech Cache
card.property:
{T}: {R}
{T}: Scrap one card from your hand to gain {R}{R}.

card.name: Massive Battlefield Confusion
card.property:
Play only when blocking.
Roll a die. 1: No effect.
2-4: Return Massive Battlefield Confusion to your hand after the mission.
5-6: Each 'Mech deals its damage to a randomly selected 'Mech (other than itself); damage from 'Mechs that have already dealt damage is redirected.

card.name: Master Scrounger
card.property: {T}: {R} {T}: Scrap three cards from your Stockpile to gain {R}{R}. Assembly (During your Repair/Reload phase, you may pay {R} once to repair 1 point of damage to one 'Mech if you have Assembly in play.)

card.name: Minefield
card.property:
Roll a die.
1-3: Return Minefield to your hand after mission.4-6: Deal 2 damage to each attacking 'Mech.

card.name: Mobile Long Tom
card.property: {T}: Deal 3 damage to one 'Mech. Use this ability only during a mission.

card.name: No Quarter
card.property:
Play only during battle.
After this battle, begin a new battle using all surviving 'Mechs from this battle. Armor does not replenish before the second battle, missiles cannot be used during that battle, and 'Mechs that have already used Alpha Strikes have 0 attack during that battle.

card.name: Oda Hideyoshi
card.property: {T}: Opponent cannot assign more than one 'Mech to block the current attack. You cannot play Mission cards during this mission. Use this ability only when declaring an attack with only one 'Mech. â€¢ Commander of the Otomo

card.name: Operations Liaison
card.property: {R}, {T}: Look at the top five cards of your Stockpile. Put one of those cards into your hand; restock the remaining cards in any order. Use this ability only during your Draw phase.

card.name: Orbital Bombardment
card.property: Put three operation counters on Orbital Bombardment when it is activated. Remove an operation counter from this card at the beginning of your turn. When the last operation counter has been removed, scrap Orbital Bombardment and deal 2 damage to any 'Mech or site for each card you scrap from your hand.

card.name: Overrun
card.property:
Play only when blocked.
If all blocking 'Mechs are scrapped during this battle, untap each attacking 'Mech at the end of battle.

card.name: Panther (PNT-10K)
card.property: Missile 1 Overheat 1: +1 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative)

card.name: Pinpoint Air Strike
card.property: Scrap Pinpoint Air Strike when it is revealed. Deal 1 damage to one site or 'Mech for every 2 construction counters above the cost of Pinpoint Air Strike.

card.name: Puma B (Adder)
card.property: Alpha Strike: +2 attack

card.name: Puma D (Adder)
card.property: Alpha Strike: +2 attack

card.name: Quick Salvage Operation
card.property:
Play only when blocking.
If any attacking 'Mechs are scrapped during this battle, put one of those 'Mechs into play at end of the battle and tap it. That 'Mech has a number of damage counters equal to one less than that 'Mech's structure.

card.name: Recon Pilot
card.property: Pilot: +1 initiative You may choose to not deal damage with 'Mech piloted by Recon Pilot and instead prevent up to 5 points of damage to that 'Mech. Use this ability only during a mission and only when attacking. Playing Recon Pilot does not count as a deployment if revealed the turn you play it. Draw a card when you activate Recon Pilot.

card.name: Report from the Norns
card.property:
Scrap Report from the Norns when it is revealed.
Activate Report from the Norns only when you are attacked. You may block the current attack with any of your untapped 'Mechs regardless of their speed.

card.name: Risky Combat Jump
card.property:
Choose one of your 'Mechs with Jump. Roll a die.
1-2: That 'Mech receives 1 damage; return Risky Combat Jump to your hand after the mission.
3-6: That 'Mech gets +3 attack; prevent up to 2 damage to that 'Mech.

card.name: Ryan Steiner
card.property: {T}: Deal 2 damage to the target. Use this ability only during a mission. â€¢ Duke of Porrima

card.name: Ryoken B (Stormcrow)
Ryoken C (Stormcrow)
card.property: <i>Exceptional ammo capacity keep this 'Mech in the field longer than most opponents.</i>

card.name: Secured Drop Site
card.property: {T}: Show the top card of your Stockpile to all players. If that card is not a 'Mech, restock it. Otherwise, put it into your hand; you may make an additional deployment this turn.

card.name: Sentinel (STL-3L)
card.property: <i>Defiance Industries produces the <i>Sentinel</i> to provide infantry and light armor support.</i>

card.name: Spider (SDR-7M)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) You may deploy Spider reveled to make an additional deployment this turn.

card.name: Star Diversion
card.property:
+1 initiative
Play only when attacking with exactly five 'Mechs.
For each 'Mech fewer than five in the blocking group, you may choose to have one of your 'Mechs deal damage to the target as if unblocked. The target may deal damage to that 'Mech.

card.name: Star Formation
card.property:
+1 initiative
Play only when attacking or blocking with exactly five 'Mechs.
Each of your engaged 'Mechs gets +1 attack.

card.name: Strafing Run
card.property: Scrap Strafing Run when it is revealed. Deal 3 structure damage to one 'Mech or site.

card.name: Superior Navigation
card.property:
Play only when unblocked.
Choose a 'Mech. Roll a die.
1-2: Draw a card after the mission.
3-4: That 'Mech gets +4 attack.
5-6: That 'Mech gets +4 attack and untaps at the end of the current mission.

card.name: Tactical Nuke
card.property:
Scrap Tactical Nuke when it is revealed.
Each player's Stockpile receives 1 damage for each construction counter above the cost of Tactical Nuke.

card.name: Thorn (THE-N)
card.property: You may deploy Thorn revealed to make an additional deployment this turn.

card.name: Thor Mobile Artillery
card.property: {T}: Deal 2 damage to one 'Mech. Use this ability only during a mission.

card.name: Thumper Battery
card.property: {T}: Deal 2 damage to one site. Use this ability only during your Missions phase, but not during a mission.

card.name: Tor Miraborg
card.property: {T}: Choose a Mission card from your Scrapheap and put it into your hand. Using this ability counts as one of your deployments. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase. â€¢ Valdherre of Gunzburg, General

card.name: Trapped!
card.property:
Choose an attacking 'Mech. Roll a die.
1-2: Return Trapped! to your hand after the mission.
3-6: Put a pinned counter on that 'Mech.
Any 'Mech with a pinned counter does not untap during its controller's Untap phase. During the controller's Missions phase but not during a mission, that player may tap two 'Mechs to remove a pinned counter.

card.name: Uller A (Kit Fox)
card.property: <i>This light 'Mech carrying a Gauss rifle has the advantage of surprise.</i>

card.name: Ulric Kerensky
card.property: {T}: Untap all of your Resources. Use this ability only during your Deploy phase. â€¢ ilKhan of Clan Wolf

card.name: UrbanMech (UM-R63)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative) UrbanMech cannot block unless guarding. <i>For most MechWarriors, the ''UrbanMech's'' upgraded weaponry doesn't make up for its lack of speed.</i>

card.name: Veteran Officer
card.property: {R}, {T}: Look at the top five cards of your Stockpile. If any of those cards are Mission cards, show them to all players and put them into your hand. Restock the remaining cards in any order. Use this ability only during your Draw phase.

card.name: Vindicator (VND-3L)
card.property: Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative)

card.name: Vlad of the Wards
card.property: Pilot: +1 initiative A 'Mech piloted by Vlad of the Wards may attack any 'Mech controlled by your opponent, regardless of that 'Mech's speed.

card.name: Vulcan (VT-5S)
card.property: Alpha Strike: +1 attack Jump (-1 attack: +1 initiative)
